name: Gray Dragon Wyrmling
senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) fire damage.

actions.name: Steam Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales steam in a 15 cone. Creatures in the area must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the creature takes 21 (6d6) fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful saving throw. Being underwater doesn’t grant resistance to this damage.
